actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias without amendment. With written report No. 97-488.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 698.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program, Third Annual Report to Congress", as a Senate document.

summary.text: Directs that the annual report of the Secretary of Transportation entitled "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program, Third Annual Report to Congress", be printed as a Senate document.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled, "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program, Third Annual Report to Congress", as a Senate document.
